answers.answer: Ouch I'm sorry mama! Good luck. My sis ended up at the hospital for five hours for the 'three hour' test.
I had to take the three hour test because my numbers were a little elevated. But I passed the three hour. I fasted to and it sucked I ate like a horse after lol
Schedule it for right when you wake up. It makes it easier.
I've already been here three hours and I'm only half way through the test so ill be here for another 2 hours :( I feel like I'm dying I'm so hungry!!

question: So it turns out my first diabetes test was a little abnormal and now I have to take the 3 hour test :( idk how they expect a pregnant woman to not eat for 12 hours!! I feel like I'm starving after 3 hours of not eating
title: gestational diabetes
